werdnagreb wrote:

> Hello,
> 
> I am looking for a case study of some java project that uses JUnit.
> What I need is the complete java source including the JUnit test
> suite, and (ideally, but not necessarily) a set of requirements or
> specifications for the project.  Any ideas of where I can find this?
> 
> This would be for my master's thesis.  I plan on analyzing the
> traceability of requirements based on the assumption that requirements
> and test cases are closely related.
> 
> Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Try HTMLUnit (http://htmlunit.sourceforge.net) I'm sure Mike will give 
you permission to use it as a case study. I'm not sure whether you'd get 
sufficiently detailed requirements, though. Mike built HTMLUnit on JUnit 
using JUnit.

Take care.
